summary: A documentary that follows the Serbian performance artist as she prepares for a retrospective of her work at The Museum of Modern Art in New York.
cast: Marina Abramovic|Ulay|Klaus Biesenbach|David Balliano|Chrissie Iles|Arthur Danto|David Blaine|James Franco|Rushka Bergman|Orlando Bloom|Tim Duquette|Brian Lane Moore|Ingrid Sischy|Ashton Swinford|Marcus White
title: Marina Abramovic: la artista est√° presente
